suggest.beapp/mailer-transport-mailgun: Send mails directly through Mailgun API
suggest.beapp/mailer-transport-mandrill: Send mails directly through Mandrill API
suggest.beapp/mailer-transport-beanstalk: Send mails information into a Beanstalk queue to be processed by a dedicated worker
suggest.beapp/mailer-transport-rabbitmq: Send mails information into a RabbitMq queue to be processed by a dedicated worker
